attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire
skills.desc: Deals 2 Pyro DMG. After the Skill finalizes: If your Hand has Overcharged Ball: Discard 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.

skills.name: Ring of Bursting Grenades
skills.desc: Deals 2 Pyro DMG, creates 1 Secondary Explosive Shells on the opponent's side of the field.

skills.name: Vertical Force Coordination
skills.desc: (Passive) After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG: Create 1 Overcharged Ball card in your Hand (Once per Round)
